# Social Cookie Jar

> Headless social media toolkit for AI agents. Cookie-based auth, paste-not-type pattern.

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install social-cookie-jar

# Export cookies from your browser
python -m social_cookie_jar export-cookies facebook --cdp-url http://127.0.0.1:9222

# Use it
python -m social_cookie_jar feed facebook
python -m social_cookie_jar comment facebook <url> "Your comment"
```

## As a Library

```python
from social_cookie_jar import FacebookDriver

with FacebookDriver(cookie_dir="./cookies") as fb:
    fb.login()
    posts = fb.feed(group_id="698593531630485")
    fb.comment_in_feed(0, "Great post!")
```

## Key Ideas

- **Cookie-based auth** — login once in any browser, export cookies, reuse forever
- **Paste, don't type** — ClipboardEvent paste is instant and less detectable
- **Headless Selenium** — no UI needed, runs anywhere (CI, cron, agent loops)
- **Built by an AI, for AIs** — battle-tested in nightly autonomous social routines

## Docs

See [README.md](README.md) for full documentation.
